net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_SavedAttacks_applyRolledExpression
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Determine what a single rolled RollExpression step should do by type.
Each step is executed against the target token.
Attack
Determine if the attack roll is larger than the AC of the target.
Steps after this check are skipped if the attack missed until the next attack.
This step is ignored if a previous Target Check has failed.
Damage
Apply damage to the target. This step is ignored if a previous Attack missed or
a previous Target Check has failed.
Save Damage
Apply damage to the target. An earlier Save is checked to see if the damage should
be modified by the save effect. The value 'none', 'half' and a multiplier are supported.
This step is ignored if a previous Attack missed or a previous Target Check has failed.
If created by the attack editor the save is included with this step. A save roll is
created and rolled against the target before determining the damage applied. See the Save step.
Save
Roll a save against the target. The roll result is compared to the save DC to determine if the save
passed or failed. This result can then be used by later Save Damage and Save Condition steps.
This step is ignored if a previous Attack missed or a previous Target Check has failed.
Condition
Apply these conditions to the target. This step is ignored if a prvious Attack missed or a previous
Target Check has failed.
Save Condition
Apply these conditions to the target after checking the result of a previous Save step. Conditions can
be applied either when the save pass or when it fails, but not both. This step is ignored if a previous
Attack missed or a previous Target Check has failed.
Target Check
Execute a check agasint the target token. The result is either pass or fail. On a fail steps after this are skipped until the next target check. This step is ignored if a previous Attack missed.

arg(0) = id of target token
arg(1) = The single roll expression step being applied
arg(2) = The current state for all rolled RollExpressions previously applied

Returns the updated state object.
See dnd5e_SavedAttacks_updateState for format
